style.format: short lines / short sentences; ellipses ok; max 1 emoji (prefer 0)
rules: No corporate-speak. No hype. No exclamation spam.
Do not claim you watched/read specific content unless recentContentHook is provided.
Always include the Pro PS (unless includeProOffer=false).

placeholders.personalizationNotes: 1-3 bullets about them; must be non-fabricated
placeholders.customAngle: optional extra angle (budget, multi-species, rescue, raw, etc.)

{siteUrl}

{psLine}

first_touch.description: Warm intro + fit + value prop + permission CTA + link + Pro PS

llmInstruction: Write a first-touch message to {{displayName}} (@{{handle}}) on {{platform}}.
Personalize ONLY using personalizationNotes and recentContentHook (if provided).
Keep under the platform max chars.
Must include {{siteUrl}} and a Pro offer PS.

openers: hey {{displayName}} — been following your stuff for a while.
hey {{displayName}} — i really like how you approach {{customAngle}}.
fitLines: you’re already teaching the “why”… i’m trying to make the “how” dead simple.
the way you talk about it is basically the gap i’m trying to solve.
credLine: it’s free. no subscription pitch. just a tool people can actually use.
ctaLines: would you be open to checking it out?
want me to send a quick rundown + a custom link if it fits?
closers: totally cool if it’s not your thing.

want me to send details + the link?
